answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC. If you no longer have a paper record of your child's immunizations, you can contact the clinic (public health unit or doctor's office) where your child was immunized and request a copy of their records.  
You can find the contact information for public health units in BC here. 
You can find more information on locating immunization records here. 
- Immunization Nurse
